channel.title: 100 errors?!?!
channel.description: i tried to compile and i got 100 error's here's the code i have in the compiler. [code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code] im a nub at these kinda things. someone please help?

item.title: 100 errors?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Fireskrit Fireskrit
item.description:
@Fireskrit wrote:

To find the problem, go back to where you were last updating, also open the compiler and compile with the errors in it. Go to the top error, and yes the little ^ arrow tells you where the problem is, but it is normally only a minor detail.

So if you changed a whole segment you might have missed out on some closing brackets }{ and made an error… or 100 :o

If you send me the error log I can try to help you find the problem!

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors?!?!
item.dc:creator: @soul_extange soul extange
item.description:
@soul_extange wrote:

i tried to compile and i got 100 error’s here’s the code i have in the compiler.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
im a nub at these kinda things.
someone please help?

Read full topic
